about.subtitle: Your reliable guide to the world of European and Ukrainian antiques
about.intro_1: Welcome to Antique Life â€” a project that stood at the origins of modern antique and vintage culture in Ukraine.
about.intro_2: We started this business almost 20 years ago, long before European antiques became a mass trend. That is why today Antique Life is not just a store, but a trusted name.
about.p_1_1: Our work begins where most never go. We massively and regularly visit French flea markets, vintage markets, and local estate sales all over France â€” from big cities to small provinces. This is exactly where we find real gems: beautiful things with history, unexpected masterpieces, and items that have not yet reached galleries or resellers.
about.p_1_2: Thanks to this, we are able to offer better prices without losing quality and authenticity.
about.p_2_1: A separate area of our work is auctions. We attend all key auctions in the south of France and other regions of Europe, where we buy lots both on client demand and for our permanent stock. This gives us access to items that rarely appear in open sales.
about.p_2_2: We also cooperate with organizations dealing with property clearance from houses and apartments. Thanks to these partnerships, we often get first access to sales of private collections and family estates â€” even before the items hit the market. This is where the strongest finds are born.
about.p_3_1: Antique Life is more than just France. For many years we have been working and continue to work with authentic antiques of the Austro-Hungarian era preserved on the territory of Ukraine.
about.p_3_2: A special place in our activity is occupied by Ukrainian decorative and applied heritage, in particular the art of Hutsulshchyna, as well as modern Ukrainian art, which we consider an important part of living cultural continuity.
about.h2_4: What you will find in our collection:
about.list_1: affordable vintage and unique trinkets with character;
about.list_3: interior items that create an atmosphere, not just decor.
about.conclusion_1: Every item in Antique Life is a story, an emotion, and a touch of time.
about.conclusion_2: We work not on the principle of 'selling', but on the principle of finding exactly what resonates. We consult, select, accompany, and deliver â€” honestly, professionally, and with respect to the client.
about.conclusion_3:
Antique Life is a business with a soul, experience, and responsibility to culture.
We were among the first.
We know the market from the inside.
And we remain the ones who set the standard.

seo.title: About Us | Antique Life

howWeWork.intro: Antique Life is a living process of search, discovery, and genuine finds. We work where antiques have not yet become a commodity, but remain a part of life, history, and family memory.
howWeWork.p_1_1: We organize and constantly conduct thoughtful antique expeditions:
howWeWork.list_1_1: night flea markets in the villages of the CÃ´te d'Azur
howWeWork.list_1_2: local morning markets that tourists do not reach
howWeWork.list_1_3: famous auctions by the sea, where recreation, culture, and shopping are combined
howWeWork.list_1_4: estate sale tours, where real family heirlooms are kept
howWeWork.p_1_2: It is in such places that we find items with character â€” those that do not appear in mass sales.
howWeWork.h2_2: ðŸ“² Live Finds â€” On Opening Day
howWeWork.p_2_1:
Everything we find during fairs, auctions, and expeditions, you immediately see in our Telegram channel.

No filters, no delays â€” you watch the process in real-time and have the opportunity to be the first to choose your item.
howWeWork.p_3_1: We accompany every find from the moment of purchase to its safe arrival to the client:
howWeWork.list_3_4: delivery to Ukraine and European countries
howWeWork.p_3_2: Every item passes through our hands â€” with respect for its age and history.
howWeWork.h2_4: Formation of Collections of Ukrainian Authenticity
howWeWork.p_4_1:
A separate area of our work is the creation of collections of Ukrainian cultural heritage.

We work with authentic antiques of the Austro-Hungarian era, Ukrainian decorative and applied art, Hutsul items, and modern Ukrainian art.

This is our responsibility â€” to preserve, return, and popularize Ukrainian authenticity in the modern world.
howWeWork.p_5_1:
Our online store presents items that are in stock and available for quick purchase.

The assortment is constantly updated and covers thousands of items â€” from affordable vintage to unique collectibles.
howWeWork.outro_1: Antique Life is not just working with antiques.
howWeWork.outro_2:
It is a path.
It is intuition.
It is trust in time.

services.page_title: Antique Life Services â€” Antiques from France and Europe

search.title: Search for antiques and vintage in France
search.desc: We professionally search for antique and vintage items at flea markets, fairs, thrift stores, estate sales, and private collections in France and Europe. This gives us access to rare items at the best prices.

auctions.title: Antique auctions in France and Europe
auctions.desc: Participation in leading auctions in the south of France and other European regions. Purchasing lots both for permanent stock and upon client request.

collections.title: Searching for collection items
collections.desc: We purposefully search for specific items, series, or collections upon client request â€” from vintage tableware to collectible antiques and art.

live_tours.title: Online tours and live reports
live_tours.desc: We conduct online tours on social networks from antique markets, thrift stores, and auctions. You can see the search process and have first access to findings in real-time.

shop_tours.title: Antique shopping tours in France
shop_tours.desc: Organization of antique tours: visiting markets, auctions, and thrift stores, accompaniment, consultations, purchasing, and delivery.

ua_antiques.title: Ukrainian antiques and authenticity
ua_antiques.desc: Forming collections of Ukrainian antiques from the Austro-Hungarian era, decorative and applied arts of the Hutsul region, and modern Ukrainian art.

online_shop.title: Online antique shop
online_shop.desc: Online store of vintage and antique items in stock. Regular updates, large assortment, quick purchase.

packaging.title: Packaging and delivery of antiques
packaging.desc: Professional packaging, storage, and delivery of antiques to Ukraine and European countries in compliance with historical item handling standards.

shipping.intro: We organize the delivery of antique and vintage items taking into account their condition, size, and location.

ukraine.title: Delivery within Ukraine
ukraine.desc: Items already located in Ukraine are delivered exclusively within Ukraine. You can choose a convenient delivery method:
list: other delivery services by prior agreement
ukraine.note: The cost of delivery is paid by the client unless otherwise agreed individually.

europe.title: Delivery from France and Europe
europe.desc: Items located in France or other European countries can be delivered throughout Europe, as well as to Ukraine. We organize:
europe.note: For fragile, oversized, or valuable items, it is possible to involve private carriers.

payment.title: Payment
payment.desc: You can pay for your order directly on the website using available online payment methods. Alternative payment options are also possible, which are agreed upon individually depending on the item and delivery conditions.

assistance.title: Assistance with independently found items
assistance.desc: Upon request, we can organize the packaging and delivery of items you have found independently at auctions or specialized European platforms, with delivery to Ukraine or European countries.

faq.subtitle: Everything you wanted to know about Antique Life
faq.q1_p: Yes, we specialize exclusively in original vintage and antique items. Each piece is hand-picked at markets and auctions in France and Europe.
faq.q2_h2: How is the delivery of fragile items carried out?
faq.q2_p: We have extensive experience in packaging antiques. We use special protective materials and reliable transportation to ensure your purchases arrive undamaged.
faq.q3_h2: Can I request a search for a specific item?
faq.q3_p: Of course. We provide personal search services. You can send us a description or a photo of the desired item, and we will try to find it for you.
faq.q4_h2: Is there a possibility to return an item?
faq.q4_p: According to our store rules, antique goods of proper quality are not subject to return, as they have historical value. However, we always describe the condition of the item in detail before purchase.
faq.conclusion_2: Contact us via the Contacts section or social media.

seo.title: FAQ â€” Frequently Asked Questions | Antique Life
seo.description: Frequently asked questions about shipping, payment, and authenticity of antiques from France.

privacy.subtitle: Protection of your personal data
privacy.intro: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect and use information.
privacy.p_1: We collect data you provide when registering, placing an order, or subscribing to news: name, phone number, email, and shipping address.
privacy.p_2: Your data is used to process orders, provide customer support, and inform you about new finds in French markets.
privacy.p_3: We take modern security measures to prevent unauthorized access to your information. Your data is not shared with third parties, except for delivery services.
privacy.conclusion: By using our site, you agree to the terms of this policy.

seo.title: Privacy Policy | Antique Life
seo.description: Learn how Antique Life protects and uses your personal data.

offer.subtitle: Sales and Purchase Agreement
offer.intro: This document is an official offer from Antique Life to any individual to enter into a sales agreement for antique and vintage items.
offer.p_1: The Seller undertakes to transfer ownership of the goods to the Buyer, and the Buyer undertakes to pay for and accept the goods under the terms of this Agreement.
offer.p_2: Acceptance of this offer is considered to be the moment the 'Place Order' button is clicked or payment is made on the website.
offer.p_3: The Buyer realizes that the items are vintage or antique and may have traces of time and use, which is not considered a defect but part of their history.
offer.conclusion: The agreement is legally binding and does not require signing paper copies.

seo.title: Public Offer â€” Agreement | Antique Life
seo.description: Terms and conditions of the sales agreement for antique goods on the Antique Life website.

refund.subtitle: Terms of return and exchange
refund.intro: We want every purchase at Antique Life to bring joy. Since we deal with antiques, there are specific return conditions.
refund.p_1: Most of our items are vintage or antique. Signs of use, patina, or minor flaws are part of their history and are not considered defects.
refund.p_2: According to current legislation, antique items of proper quality are not subject to return or exchange. We ask you to carefully study photos and descriptions before purchasing.
refund.p_3: If an item was damaged during transport, please document it directly at the delivery service branch and contact us within 24 hours.
refund.conclusion: We are always open to dialogue and ready to provide additional photos or videos of the item before shipping.

seo.title: Refund Policy | Antique Life
seo.description: Terms of return and exchange for antique goods at Antique Life.
